info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 01 at 5:40AM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...Pockets of Light Freezing Rain and Freezing Drizzle This Morning... A few pockets of light freezing rain and freezing drizzle are expected this morning across the St. Lawrence Valley and northern Adirondacks, with pre-dawn temperatures right around 32 degrees. Untreated surfaces may become icy until temperatures warm above freezing by 9am. Precautionary/Preparedness Actions... The light freezing rain and freezing drizzle may quickly coat roadways with a thin layer of ice that may be undetectable. Please use caution...especially on bridges...overpasses and around curves. Allow plenty of stopping distance and avoid braking suddenly.
